body:
**Do you live in or near Washington, DC and ride the bus? This app is for you!** [](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/bustrackdc/id597188689?ls=1&mt=8) Find the nearest bus stops, when the next bus is arriving, and where each route will take you, all in real time thanks to WMATA's data feeds. I take the bus to work and I made this app after my favorite bus app stopped working earlier this year. I hope you find it as useful as I do! The app is free, but if you think it's worth something, throw in a donation!
## Screenshots ![Find a bus stop near you](https://raw.github.com/j-ro/WheresTheBusDC/master/appstore/screenshot1.png) ![See when your bus is arriving](https://raw.github.com/j-ro/WheresTheBusDC/master/appstore/screenshot2.png) ![Is that bus going your way? Find out with a route map.](https://raw.github.com/j-ro/WheresTheBusDC/master/appstore/screenshot3.png) This software is free and open source -- if you encounter any problems or bugs, or if you want to help me make this app better, go to https://github.com/j-ro/WheresTheBusDC
tagline: An iOS app to find out when your bus is coming to a stop near you, using WMATA prediction data.
